Magnesium Sparkling Water - Triple Pack of 24
April W. (Australia)
Not a fan

I was looking forward to these drinks but they are hard to drink with very little flavour. Maybe if I add lemon or something might help.

Hi April, were truly sorry to hear that the flavour didnt meet your expectations, and its important we publish the negative reviews like this, with the positive (NB. we dont get many negatives..!)

We know our flavours dont appeal to 100% of people (does any flavour on earth appeal to everyone?), but we will be restocking Cherry soon, as well as introducing a new flavour in the coming weeks. Perhaps these might be more to your palate?

We hope to win you back!

Warm regards,

The Heylo Team
